OOC: I assume that the bot landed near of Blackfang and Nightlight.

Nightlight:::

"Did you saw..." said Nightlight but she didn't end the phrase, she 
moved cautionsly towards the bot and some feet far of him said "Are 
you... all right?"


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> (Continued from the Crash Course topic:)
> 
> A wild yell comes from above the duo.  If they care to look up, 
> they can see a grey-and-white Autobot in a whole lotta trouble, his 
> rocket backpack trailing smoke as he careens across the sky.  
> Abruptly, the device flares and shorts out, sending him plunging 
> toward the ground.
> 
> "Oh man this is gonna hurt -" he groans right before he crash-lands.
> -WHAM!-
> "... I ... was ... right ... owwww ..."
> 
> OOC: This guy's about nine feet tall, and a close replica in 
> appearence to the original G1 Wheeljack - except for the rocketpack 
> and two shoulder turrets instead of one.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > Nightlight::
> > 
> > "Then we should hurry up"replied Nightligh"Our leader should know 
> > this... about those faction"
